exploreUrl:
<js>
sort = [];
nowCode = "{{Math.floor(Date.now()/1000)}\}"
push = (title, url, type1, type2) => sort.push({
	title: title,
	url: url,
	style: {
		layout_flexGrow: type1,
		layout_flexBasisPercent: type2
	}
});
push("å…¨éƒ¨ğŸŒŠåˆ†ç±»", null, 1, 1)
arList = ["æ ¡å›­æ˜¥è‰²", "ä¸œæ–¹ç„å¹»", "ä¹¡æ‘çˆ±æƒ…", "éƒ½å¸‚æ¿€æƒ…", "å®¶åº­ä¹±ä¼¦", "å¨±ä¹æ˜æ˜Ÿ", "å†å²æ¶ç©º", "ç»å…¸æ­¦ä¾ ", "ç³»ç»Ÿå¼‚èƒ½", "ç©¿è¶Šé‡ç”Ÿ", "ç§‘å­¦å¹»æƒ³", "åŒäººæ”¹ç¼–", "å¼ºå¥¸è½®å¥¸", "è¥¿æ–¹é­”å¹»", "è´¤è€…å°è¯´", "å •è½", "åå·®", "å‡Œè¾±", "çº¯çˆ±", "ç™¾åˆ", "é‡å£", "ä¼ªå¨˜", "æ€§å¥´", "èè‰", "ç¦å¿Œ", "ç†Ÿå¥³", "NTR", "åªšé»‘", "ç»¿å¸½", "è°ƒæ•™", "æ­£å¤ª", "å¥³ä¸»", "åè½¬", "ä¸‹å…‹ä¸Š", "ç¾è€»", "å…¶ä»–", "æ ¡å›­", "ç„å¹»", "ä¹¡æ‘", "ä¹±ä¼¦", "éƒ½å¸‚", "å†å²", "æ­¦ä¾ ", "ç³»ç»Ÿ", "ç©¿è¶Š", "ç§‘å¹»", "åŒäºº", "å¼ºå¥¸", "å¥‡å¹»", "è´¤è€…", "æ˜æ˜Ÿ"]
arList.map((tag, index) => {
	url = `{{getUrl()}}index.php/api/data/book?callback=&list=${index+3}&order=addtime&pay=0&finish=0&tags=0&size=0&page={{page}}&cid=${index+3}&_=${nowCode}`;
	push(tag, url, 1, 0.25);
});
nrList = ["ğŸ”–å…¨éƒ¨ğŸ”–", "ğŸ”–ç„å¹»ğŸ”–", "ğŸ”–å¥‡å¹»ğŸ”–", "æ­¦ä¾ ", "ğŸ”–ä»™ä¾ ğŸ”–", "ğŸ”–éƒ½å¸‚ğŸ”–", "ğŸ”–è¨€æƒ…ğŸ”–", "ğŸ”–å†å²ğŸ”–", "ğŸ”–å†›äº‹ğŸ”–", "ğŸ”–æ¸¸æˆğŸ”–", "ğŸ”–æ‚¬ç–‘ğŸ”–", "ğŸ”–ç§‘å¹»ğŸ”–", "çµå¼‚ğŸ”–", "äºŒæ¬¡å…ƒğŸ”–", "ğŸ”–çŸ­ç¯‡ğŸ”–"]
mrList = ["å…¨éƒ¨", "è¿è½½ä¸­", "å®Œç»“"]
prList = ['å…¨éƒ¨', '30ä¸‡å­—', '30-50ä¸‡', '50-100ä¸‡', '100-200ä¸‡', '200ä¸‡']
orList = ["å…¨éƒ¨", "å…è´¹", "ä»˜è´¹", "VIP"]
nrList.map((tag, index) => {
	url = `{{getUrl()}}index.php/api/data/book?callback=&list=${index+3}&order=hits&pay=0&finish=0&tags=0&size=0&page={{page}}&cid=${index+3}&_=${nowCode}`;
	push(tag, url, 1, 1);
	mrList.map((teg, uei) => {
		url = `{{getUrl()}}index.php/api/data/book?callback=&list=${index+3}&order=hits&pay=0&finish=${uei}&tags=0&size=0&page={{page}}&cid=${index+3}&_=${nowCode}`;
		push(teg, url, 1, 0.25);
	});
	prList.map((tog, uri) => {
		mrList.map((teg, uei) => {
			url = `{{getUrl()}}index.php/api/data/book?callback=&list=${index+3}&order=hits&pay=0&finish=${uei}&tags=0&size=${uri}&page={{page}}&cid=${index+3}&_=${nowCode}`;
			push(tog, url, 1, 0.25);
		});
	});
	orList.map((trg, ure) => {
		mrList.map((teg, uei) => {
			url = `{{getUrl()}}index.php/api/data/book?callback=&list=${index+3}&order=hits&pay=${ure}&finish=${uei}&tags=0&size=0&page={{page}}&cid=${index+3}&_=${nowCode}`;
			push(trg, url, 1, 0.25);
		});
	});
});

JSON.stringify(sort)
</js>
